title: Modern Redesign for Local Business
tagline: Revitalizing a brand through clean design, improved UX, and higher engagement.
overview: This project showcases a complete website redesign focused on performance, usability, and brand consistency.

Our approach emphasized clarity, conversion, and maintainability. The layout was rebuilt with responsive grids, improved visual hierarchy, and modular content sections designed for future scalability.
overviewHighlights: Custom CMS fields for client control
keyHighlights: Integrated booking and lead capture system

process.text: We start by understanding your goals, target audience, and competition — gathering insights that shape our entire creative approach.
Our design team crafts a visual language that aligns with your brand identity, ensuring a user experience that feels intentional and intuitive.
We translate designs into fast, responsive code using modern frameworks and clean practices that prioritize performance and accessibility.
After launch, we monitor performance, optimize SEO, and provide post-launch support to ensure your site continues to evolve with your goals.

clientImpact.text: Within weeks of launch, the client reported stronger user engagement and easier lead tracking. The streamlined layout reduced bounce rates by over 30%, while the new booking form generated consistent inquiries from both desktop and mobile users.

testimonial.quote: 44 Studios completely transformed our website — it looks stunning and actually brings us new clients.
testimonial.author: Client Name, Business Owner
